com.intel.icecp.rpc

Interface OnCommandMessage<M extends Module,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - Module supporting this interface
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface OnCommandMessage<M extends Module,T>
    Interface used to process commands received by the module

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T onCommandMessage(M context)
      Callback this interface implements when a message is received
      default Future<T> onCommandMessageAsync(ExecutorService executorService, M context)
      Default implementation of executing the onCommandMessage asynchronously in a pool

    • Method Detail

      • onCommandMessage

        T onCommandMessage(M context)
            throws Exception
        Callback this interface implements when a message is received
        Parameters:
        context - of the Module in which the message was received
        Returns:
        Optional response message, if a response was requested
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onCommandMessageAsync

        default Future<T> onCommandMessageAsync(ExecutorService executorService,
                                        M context)
        Default implementation of executing the onCommandMessage asynchronously in a pool
        Parameters:
        executorService - ExecutorService for submit
        context - Context for onCommandMessage
        Returns:
        Future to test for completion.
